thread.title: Cindi Sheets

author: Cindi Sheets
title: Cindi Sheets
text:
Being a first time user of ZipRecruiter, a had a couple questions.
It being a Sunday, was unsure of the available support
To my surprise, I reached Maxcine who was very pleasant and patient walking me through my questions. Maxine also took the extra time to both show and offered suggestions on how to utilize our Job postings.
Thank you Maxine, and ZipRecruiter for having live support
